text:
The Palace of War in [[Metrol]] was the seat of [[Cyre]]â€™s military
leadership, where commanders plotted the course
of the [[Last War]]. The Armory of [[Galifar]] once held the most
impressive engines of war possessed by the
[[Five Nations]]. The spire below the palace was a
fortress, and the Vermishard was surrounded by
garrisons and drill yards. 

Today, it lies in ruin, and has been heavily looted by Empress [[Donata]]'s soldiers.
title: Vermishard of War
tags: fortress garrison Metrol Vermishards ruin [[Crown Point]]
